page.title: 17Attitudes
page.content:
The community includes:the retired, successful middle management,a large group of young skilled people and a few "working class."
The retired are suspicious of change. They think that their interests are neglected. They fear loneliness and illness.They feel that something should be done to improve conditions,but they are not sure what. Middle management people are impatient with established ways.They say that they would never run their businesses in the way that the village is organised. They believe in sudden change as long as it follows their views.The young and skilled are disinterested in the shortcomings of the village.They like the life and travel to find their pleasures it fails to provide.
